Hero.name: Shuntia
Hero.tagline: I’m a systems and creative developer building tools, editors, and early-stage protocols — combining low-level engineering with artistic technology.

About.title: About Me
About.short: I’m a high school developer exploring the intersection of systems engineering and creative technology. I enjoy building tools from scratch — video editors, small utilities, and even early-stage protocol concepts. I work in both English and Japanese and like solving problems that feel ambitious for my age.
About.extended: My interests span systems programming, multimedia processing, UI motion, and infrastructure concepts. I care about clarity of design, performance, and long-term reliability. I’m especially drawn to projects that combine engineering with creativity — whether that’s building a video editor, shaping a protocol idea, or designing interfaces that feel intuitive and expressive.

lunaris.name: Lunaris
lunaris.description: A modular, extensible video editor designed around a node graph and clean internal architecture. Focused on clarity, performance, and creative flexibility.
